channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Deep pothole westbound from Bishops Cleeve on Finlay Way between Willow Park Drive & The withers, 21st January
item.description:
Westbound from Bishops Cleeve on Finlay Way between Willow Park Drive & The Withers. Caused a near side front tyre blowout

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Finlay Way, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large area of pot holes, 21st January
item.description:
Travelling from the entrance/exit of the retail park (towards Bishops Cleeve) up to the traffic light junction of the safe storage business. There is a long line of pot holes appearing on the left hand carriageway.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingsditch Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ref 22097461 TWO holes near the lampost and the grassed area, 21st January
item.description:
Ref 22097461 TWO holes in the road near the lampost and the grassed area. Althought this section between St Nicholas Church and the level crossing is not too bad, there are several pot holes and evidence of the road breaking up.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Swindon Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree at an odd angle, 21st January
item.description:
It may be how this tree grows, but it looks like it's about to topple over

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wyman's Road, Whaddon, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ref 22097461 on the south side of the road as one goes round the corner, 21st January
item.description:
Ref 22097461 One of the many potholes between the Racecourse Roundabout and St Nicholas Church
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 62, Swindon Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
